text.__SUMMARY__:
Inga exilis is a species of legume in the family Fabaceae.
It is found only in Brazil.
text.Sources: World Conservation Monitoring Centre (1998). "Inga exilis". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T38253A10108031. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T38253A10108031.en. Retrieved 16 December 2017.
